操你妈傻逼暴雪还我账号！！！！
暴雪是脸都不要了，我也是脸都不要了还几把玩这B游戏。16年花328买典藏版，去年花198买监测站礼包，老子皮肤呢？

我曾經熱愛這個游戲，ow2改成5V5玩了兩個月就不想玩了 ，1的時候游戲雖然要買 ，可是很快樂 。2變成免費之後甚至可以只送兩個皮膚給老玩家，以前只需要慢慢存游戲幣來買皮膚， 應該説那時候你們還不想讓玩家爲了什麽而玩游戲 ，而是單純爲了玩這個游戲而玩，那時候我還很喜歡這個游戲，OW1的最後是你們沒有更新而比較少人玩，但是我仍然每一天上去玩一兩個小時，2更新了之後我嘗試玩了幾個禮拜，我開始覺得這個游戲不值得玩，OW2第一個賽季我通行證102級，第二個賽季30，第三個賽季0。直到現在我還是想上去玩兩把，但是根本沒有欲望，玩上去根本沒有以前那種爽快感.這幾年OW1沒更新到現在更新了什麽:6v6變成5V5,你們想讓坦克沒那麽强可是卻讓雙坦配合不復存在。UI負優化，以前助攻都有讓人舒適的那種聲音被你們刪除，英雄語音被你們刪除了一部分，換成最新的語音，可是最新的語音就只有一兩句話,一天可以觸發三四次同一樣的語音。畫面優化暫且不談。數據丟失錯誤,請問一下OW1玩家以前賽季的資料爲什麽不見了，但你們一句話不說就全刪了嗎? OW1數據轉移OW2轉移的東西有一部分都可以被你們丟失，噴漆和語音我在設定的時候根本不是我在1的時候的設定。你們上steam平臺是爲了什麽，爲了更多的知名度來賺錢而已吧。獨行獨斷，趕走老玩家吸引新玩家。很多東西都應該改回去。你們從來都不屑於聽取玩家的建議，特別是使用中文的玩家，我會給這個游戲給負評。我愛這個游戲，曾經。

司马暴雪

[h1] No. [/h1]

Save your time. Save your money.

Overwatch "2" is a slap in the face, not only to fans of the original release, but the industry as a whole. It's an MTX riddled clownfest that has no respect for itself, or it's players.

- The original director left abruptly before the game even came out. Massive red flag right there.

- FOMO tactics and horrible MTX. Free players get very little.

- Removed content and features the original game had, and added very little to compensate for it.

- New characters are locked behind the battlepass. When the battlepass expires, you still have to go through an obnoxious unlock process. In a hero-based shooter that makes heavy use of counter picking, I don't need to tell you how bad this is for the health of the game.

- The supposed reason the game was being developed, the PvE mode, was cancelled. You can still play the missions, but there is very little replay-ability behind them without the main, advertised feature. Not only this, they still have the gall to charge for them, and will likely continue to do so with future mission releases.

- The game was changed from 6 v 6 into 5 v 5. This is subjective, but I believe it greatly harmed the game and sucked a lot of fun out of it. No one liked double shield, goats, etc etc, but the game has turned into a spammy brawl fest that has made playing both tanks and supports quite miserable.

All of this is just scratching the surface. I really can't recommend the game, let alone support Blizzard. Go play another shooter.

[b]或许每一位暴黑都是曾经最坚定的暴白。[/b]

那年游戏发售前，偶然看到它的宣传cg《双龙》，一下子就被吸引住入坑了。最后买了三个328，一个大号，一个专玩猎空的小号，还有一个送朋友。
后来听说《双龙》获得了好莱坞音乐传媒奖提名，我当时很感叹：“做个游戏能顺手拿个好莱坞大奖，真不愧是暴雪啊”

那时候的UC还是手机浏览器一哥，我记得游戏发售之后，在UC每一篇游戏文章下面都是清一色的“不说了，正在前往66号公路”，
“干翻腾讯超越英雄联盟！”

那时候大家都很菜，输了就说惜败惜败。战斗结算完，回到主页面就看到一群白字在接龙“为所欲为”，笑一下，然后又投入到紧张刺激的下一场战斗。

不打游戏的时候最爱去b站看努巴尼守望先锋的国服精彩集锦，印象最深刻的是有一集是天使一个大拉五个，配上激昂的bgm真的让人感觉热血沸腾。
（顺带一提“努巴尼真好吃~”）

不管怎样，当时的OW，真的对得起2016年度最佳。

但现在呢，可以说现在的暴雪和曾经的暴雪不是同一家公司了。2021年姐夫jeff也离职后，当年的那批开发人员应该走完了吧。
现在玩家们对守望先锋的看法普遍分成了激进派和保守派两个极端，激进派会用激烈的言语在各个平台攻击这款游戏，而保守派则会认为激进派的攻击太过于保守了。再顺带一提，如果有三国杀玩家看到这里，你不给暴雪刷差评我可就去给三国杀刷好评啊（
至于游戏唯一不被攻击的，恐怕只有它在3D区的贡献了吧。

以及，
鲍勃考迪克我真的谢谢你这个天打雷劈的好心人，
你码的坟头贡品必备偷吃，骨灰盒公摊面积至少90%，墓碑上的照片打马赛克只打在嘴上。给你烧的纸钱我绝对买通牛头马面在阴间护你周全，地府下油锅都给你安排快速通道。
真是脸都不要了！还他妈的《守望先锋 归来》，归西去吧你！淦你大爷的，剑来！！！

（补充：本评测的收到的所有点数都将用来给考迪克的亲妈购买骨灰盒。啊，对不起忘了，考迪克没有亲妈。）

OK，怀旧和情绪宣泄到此结束，作为一个评测，还是尽到评测的义务，我尽量不带主观情绪的客观评价一下游戏本身：

首先对新玩家而言，不要盲目充值，不要盲目充值。以及你完全没必要在意曾经的OW是怎样的，毕竟之前没玩过，不会有老玩家的落差感，游戏质量至少及格线是有的。不管这款游戏曾经如何如何，对你的现在游戏体验不会有任何影响。只有你自己亲自去试试，觉得好玩，就留下来继续玩；觉得不好玩，那就删了，最后再打个差评。

[b]但对老玩家而言，只能问问自己，究竟要看多少遍《双龙》，才能回到2016年的那个夏天？[/b]

I do not recommend this game to anyone except maybe casual players who'd not play it a lot and only play it with friends.

If you are looking for a game to play pve with your friends, play Deep rock galactic, not overwatch, especially with how little replayability there is on it's 3 pve missions which you have to pay 15 euros for, since they have near 0 replayability it is way better to watch them on youtube.

The people that manage the decisions for what happens to the game only care about making money, it is extremely rare if they make a choice that doesn't guarantee them money, such as fixing bugs that aren't very known, adding features(that previously existed) unless its to slowly drip feed them(the on fire system they could have done in 1 week or less for example since every voiceline was already implemented, yet they took 10 months to add it).

They also make you pay for 2 missions(3 if you don't count the one that was made as a demo 4 years ago) 15 euros, which should been free considering how they got rid of a consumer friendly monetization to make a very much horrible monetization in which you get very very few rewards without paying and for the battlepass you need to pay 10 euros for each, it does not give the currency used to buy it back unlike other battlepasses.

There was also a big promise on a actual pve mode that'd have many missions, highly replayable content, etc, yet all they did in the 4 years they kept overwatch 1 players waiting was 2 missions(3 if you count the one they made 4 years ago for a demo, the highly replayable content being cancelled very much likely because it wouldn't make them as much money as making people pay 15 euros for every 3 missions(lets say there will be 30 missions, thats 150 euros you'd have paid by the time they'd be done releasing them, and likely over the span of 7 years or so).

TLDR: they make promises they wont fullfill, they don't care about the players and only about money and you should not invest time or money into this game as it will dissapoint you many times down the road.

(Хомячки набегут и скажу еее ну а ни за сезон дают 1500 легаси манет ыыы и можеш купить скин за них ыыы - Да но только те которые уже вышли)) остальные будь добр 1900 накопи и не факт что сможеш купить , и то за тот же самый сезон ты бы мог в 1 овере на халяве получить 3-4 скина за сезон(За тоже время) примерно)

Overwatch fu il mio hero shooter  preferito, l'ho di gran lunga preferito a Team Fortress 2 laddove su questo avrò speso 100 ore scarse mentre su OW nel suo primo anno di vita avrò facilmente raggiunto le 1200 ore.
Peccato che la prima versione di Overwatch nonostante tutto il suo potenziale, tra lore nascosta e mostrata con i video update, comics ecc.ecc. come gioco sia stato  sacrificato da Blizzard stessa a favore della Overwatch league, quindi hanno ascoltato 4 gatti al posto della maggioranza della  community e dalla mancanza negli anni di più contenuti interessanti infatti  a fine vita la prima versione del gioco aveva sempre gli stessi identici eventi creati 6 anni prima, io personalmente iniziai a detestare e abbandonare il gioco dopo 2-3 anni  dalla sua uscita con rientri brevi ogni  tot ma con pause lunghe mesi o addirittura, prima del rilascio di Overwatch 2, di anni.
Overwatch 2 fu ed è una mega patch del primo capitolo, hanno tentato di dare una nuova vita a un gioco morto-morente e bene o male ci sono riusciti, almeno in parte, e dico in parte perchè il gioco è passato dall'essere un loot box gestito anche benino a un F2P con un sistema battle pass orribile a livello di farming soprattutto se il mese successivo non volete spendere soldi reali per continuare a usarlo .
Alla seconda versione del gioco ci avrò dedicato giusto il tempo per fare il primo e secondo battle pass e devo dire che nei primi momenti il gioco reggeva grazie al fattore novità ma dopo un tot si sentivano alcune lacune  e una Blizzard capace di fare gli stessi identici errori commessi con il primo capitolo .
Ora su steam l'ho avviato giusto per curiosata ma a occhio mi è sembrato di vedere lo stesso gioco di un anno fa, pochissimi cambiamenti l'unica cosa positiva è che il gioco ha almeno adesso riacquisto un po' di playerbase anche se sicuramente calerà nel giro di poco.
Potrei consigliare il gioco soprattutto visto quanto ci ho giocato io e come me molti altri, ma sta seconda versione non è la stessa cosa della prima e Blizzard si vede poco interessata a tenerla in vita ,basta vedere  la cancellazione della modalità PVE, il consiglio più grande è di non spendere manco un centesimo per il battle pass e giocare il gioco ogni tanto

                                   赤石冬溪，似玛瑙潭。
                                   彼阳晚意，暖梦似乐。
                                   寐游浮沐，若雉飞舞。

Подведем итоги, студия отличилась лишь малым количеством проектов ( доната ) которые смогли хоть как то попасть в медиа пространство, чего вы в конце концов ждали, игры нынче делать дорого, тем более откуда деньги у такой маленькой инди студии как blizzard

Результаты Activision Blizzard (NASDAQ: ATVI) за весь 2022 год
Ключевые финансовые результаты
Выручка: 7,53 млрд долларов США (на 14% меньше, чем в 2021 финансовом году).

Чистая прибыль: 1,51 млрд долларов США (на 44% меньше, чем в 2021 финансовом году).

Маржа прибыли: 20% (по сравнению с 31% в 2021 финансовом году). Снижение маржи было вызвано снижением выручки.

Прибыль на акцию: 1,94 доллара США (по сравнению с 3,47 доллара США в 2021 финансовом году).

[h1] Близзард уже давно не делают игры - они делают деньги. [/h1]

Имею +100 часов в игре, но на других платформах. Хочу сказать, что игра когда-то была действительно отличной, но Близзы всё испортили. Компания превратилась в разводил, которые думают только о заработке. Сейчас перед ними стоит задача выжимания денег из игроков, при этом используя минимум усилий. Цифра два в названии по факту это отражает - ничего не было кардинально изменено, близзы нагнали хайпу, чтобы продвинуть новые скины и баттлпасы за нескромные суммы денег. От пве-режима решили отказаться, видимо, потому что были сильно заняты как раз этими самыми скинами (они то деньги приносят, в отличии от масштабного нового режима, на который пришлось бы потратить уйму ресурсов). 

Призываю ни в коем случае не качать это подобие игры, даже за бесплатно.
better than tf2

I've been playing since 2017. Going free to play back in 2022 was good news to me if it meant constant new content and awesome paid cosmetics, but it wasn't so simple.

The game itself is fun, polished and full of cool features. It is absolutely worth it to try for a few hours, even if the new player experience sucks a bit because of content locked behind progression. However, the bad stuff severely outweights everything else.

[hr][/hr]

- New players have to play for dozens of hours to unlock all heroes, or pay for a bundle which is nonsensical and ridiculous for a competitive game in which heroes can be meta and not all heroes are viable all the time.
- The cosmetics and cosmetic bundles have top-notch quality but are ridiculously expensive and all the evil marketing tactics are right there on your face. They make zero effort to hide it. For season 6 they did not offer an option to buy the individual new story missions, instead you have to pay for a bundle with more content for "good value". Now watch them revert this just to say they're listening and that they care.
- The worst battle pass in all of gaming. Half of it is useless filler content (sprays, name cards, icons, etc.) and you get zero coins back unlike most other games (COINS are the paid currency, CREDITS are the free currency and TOKENS are another paid currency used for eSport skins).

In summary, play it. It is free and it is good, and I didn't even mention the potential for custom content with the free scripting tools that it comes with. But I'm leaving a negative review because the company behind it fucking sucks balls, and you [b]MUST NOT give them ONE cent[/b]. They are as scummy, scammy and greedy as they can get. I feel bad for all the devs and brave people fighting for the future of OW2.

Shoutout to John Spector, Aaron Keller and Jared Neuss for being the face of the team and enduring the shitstorm.

It's really just not good. This is the exact same gameplay as Team Fortress 2, from 10+ years ago.

Except, all of the visuals are far less distinct than TF2. In TF2 you can very clearly distinguish between the Medic, the Pyro, the Heavy - here, there's basically "Big blob, small blob, lots of particle effects covering them". It lacks clarity.

I can't stress this enough, the gameplay is THE EXACT SAME as TF2. I shot a dude's sentry then pushed the payload.

A Blizzard é uma empresa fracassada e o Overwatch 2 é o seu maior fracasso, prometeram muito e não entregaram NADA da grande mudança que vinham anunciando há anos. Entregaram o jogo piorado com o número 2 no nome e com skins superfaturas para lucrarem de alguma forma, sem contar esse passes de batalhas RIDÍCULOS que quase não te dão nada em troca!!!! Este jogo é um verdadeiro descaso com o consumidor e com os seus leais jogadores que acompanham o jogo há anos. Em 2020 eu ganhei uma chave do jogo gratuitamente e somente por isso não estou mais revoltada, eles simplesmente tornaram o jogo gratuito e quem pagou pelo jogo teve seu dinheiro jogado no lixo. Um absurdo...
